title: Raven's Nest
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Western, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out
description: Tucked away at the base of Red Chair on Whistler Mountain is a vegetarian/vegan restaurant, which is the first for North American ski resorts. Only 2 items on the menu aren't vegan. Has a variety of menu items from a Korean beef kim chi sandwich to a chicken pita pocket with apple walnut slaw. Other food includes Gardein sandwiches, salads, mac'n'cheese, chocolate brownies and more.
